name: Flappy Phoenix (SquishyDove)
description:
This is a small project I put together in a handful of days. The idea of Takanashi Kiara replacing the original Flappy Bird and flailing her way across the landscape came into my head one morning and was so entertaining to me I had to make it. It's a silly little game, and there isn't much to it, but I hope you enjoy it anyway. 

Kiara is a Virtual Youtuber, part-time idol, part-time warrior, full-time phoenix and member of the world-famous HoloMyth! You can find her channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHsx4Hqa-1ORjQTh9TYDhww/featured
